title: What are some app examples that did sharing (app content) well? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best sharing app i  ever came across is theShareIt app.This app uses the wifi to transfer data , apps , songs , videos, just anything.Best feature of this app i like is its connectivity. It is so easily connected, nothing to pair, nothing to open the visibility, no one to ask permission.Using wifi makes the speed of transfer go wow!!.I hope i answered your need.Enjoy ;-) ;-)
Super beam (Android) & Share It ( both for IOS and Android )
